title: Bach - Well-Tempered Clavier, Book 1 - Richter (1969, Melodiya)
description:
* CD info
Bach - Well-Tempered Clavier, Book 1 - Richter (1969, Melodiya) [2 CDs]

Why only Book 1? Book 2 of the same label is infamous for being either a fraud or a mistake: it's somehow a repackaging of the 1973 RCA recording...
But Book 1 - that you have in its entirety in this torrent - is 100% original and only occurrence of Richter breathtaking 1969 interpretation.


* Technicals 
Total duration - 02h 01m 42s
Average bitrate - 568 kbps
Encoder - FLAC 1.3.1, lossless, compression level 5


* Tracks
Please see here: http://www.allmusic.com/album/release/js-bach-the-well-tempered-clavier-book-1-mr0003534029

Welcome to Caudheur's Classical Catalog (CCC)!


I have a pretty decent collection of classical music, encoded in lossless format (FLAC).

I will start to upload as much as I can, because I believe great works of art should be shared for all mankind  :)

You can visit my catalogue here:        
https://pirates-forum.org/Thread-Caudheur-s-Classical-Catalog-Classical-Music-Rarities


I wish you a pleasant listening, and don't forget to seed so that Music lives on
